speaker:

text:

              it

              no

              saw
               
              them
              ?

speaker:

              FREDERICK
text:
It
               
              cannot
               
              be
              .
               
              Some
               
              villains
               
              of
               
              my
               
              court

speaker:
DUKE
               
              FREDERICK
text:
Are
               
              of
               
              consent
               
              and
               
              sufferance
               
              in
               
              this
              .

FIRST
               
              LORD
text:
I
               
              cannot

              of
               
              any
               
              that
               
              did
               
              see
               
              her
              .

speaker:

              LORD
text:
The
               
              ladies
               
              her

              of
               
              her

Saw

              ,
               
              and
               
              in
               
              the

              early

              LORD
text:
They
               
              found
               
              the
               
              bed
               
              untreasured
               
              of
               
              their

              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              LORD
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              the

              at

              so
               
              oft

speaker:

              LORD

Your

              was

              to
               
              laugh
               
              is
               
              also
               
              missing
              .

speaker:

              LORD
text:
Hisperia
              ,
               
              the

              gentlewoman
              ,

speaker:

Confesses

Your

The

              of

              youth
